Title: When This Is Over
Writer: Courtney A. Kemp (created by), Courtney A. Kemp, Gabriela Uribe, Jeff Dix (executive story editor), Monica Mitchell (story editor), Gabriela Uribe (staff writer), Andre J. Ferguson (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: When the RICO case comes crashing down, Angela breaks ranks to form her own A-team with surprising allies. LaKeisha takes a stand of her own while Ghost, Tommy, Tasha, and Angela race against the clock to prove their innocence.
